verses.verse: Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
How <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H575><s%> will ye <S%H3013>vex<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and break me in <S%H1792>pieces<s%> with <S%H4405>words?<s%>
These <S%H2088><s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> have ye <S%H3637>reproached<s%> me: ye are <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H954>ashamed<s%> that ye make yourselves <S%H1970>strange<s%> to me.
And <S%H637><s%> be it <S%H551>indeed<s%> that I have <S%H7686>erred,<s%> mine <S%H4879>error<s%> <S%H3885>remaineth<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> myself.
If <S%H518><s%> <S%H551>indeed<s%> ye will <S%H1431>magnify<s%> yourselves <S%H5921>against<s%> me, and <S%H3198>plead<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me my reproach: <S%H2781><s%>
Know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H645>now<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> hath <S%H5791>overthrown<s%> me, and hath <S%H5362>compassed<s%> <S%H5921><s%> me with his <S%H4685>net.<s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I cry <S%H6817>out<s%> of <S%H2555>wrong,<s%> but I am <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6030>heard:<s%> I cry <S%H7768>aloud,<s%> but there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
He hath fenced <S%H1443>up<s%> my <S%H734>way<s%> that I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H5674>pass,<s%> and he hath <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> my <S%H5410>paths.<s%>
He hath stripped me <S%H6584>of<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> my <S%H3519>glory,<s%> and <S%H5493>taken<s%> the <S%H5850>crown<s%> from my <S%H7218>head.<s%>
He hath <S%H5422>destroyed<s%> me on every <S%H5439>side,<s%> and I am <S%H1980>gone:<s%> and mine <S%H8615>hope<s%> hath he <S%H5265>removed<s%> like a <S%H6086>tree.<s%>
He hath also <S%H2734>kindled<s%> his <S%H639>wrath<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, and he <S%H2803>counteth<s%> me unto him as one of his <S%H6862>enemies.<s%>

His <S%H1416>troops<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> and raise <S%H5549>up<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, and <S%H2583>encamp<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> my <S%H168>tabernacle.<s%>
He hath put my brethren <S%H7368>far<s%> <S%H251><s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> me, and mine <S%H3045>acquaintance<s%> are <S%H389>verily<s%> <S%H2114>estranged<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me.
My <S%H7138>kinsfolk<s%> have <S%H2308>failed,<s%> and my familiar <S%H3045>friends<s%> have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> me.

They that <S%H1481>dwell<s%> in mine <S%H1004>house,<s%> and my <S%H519>maids,<s%> <S%H2803>count<s%> me for a <S%H2114>stranger:<s%> I <S%H1961>am<s%> an <S%H5237>alien<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight.<s%>
I <S%H7121>called<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and he gave me <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6030>answer;<s%> I <S%H2603>entreated<s%> him <S%H1119>with<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
My <S%H7307>breath<s%> is <S%H2114>strange<s%> to my <S%H802>wife,<s%> though I <S%H2603>entreated<s%> for the <S%H1121>children's<s%> sake of mine own <S%H990>body.<s%>
Yea, <S%H1571><s%> young <S%H5759>children<s%> <S%H3988>despised<s%> me; I <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> against me.
All <S%H3605><s%> my <S%H5475>inward<s%> <S%H4962>friends<s%> <S%H8581>abhorred<s%> me: and they <S%H2088>whom<s%> I <S%H157>loved<s%> are <S%H2015>turned<s%> against me.
My <S%H6106>bone<s%> <S%H1692>cleaveth<s%> to my <S%H5785>skin<s%> and to my <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and I am <S%H4422>escaped<s%> with the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of my <S%H8127>teeth.<s%>
Have pity <S%H2603>upon<s%> me, have pity <S%H2603>upon<s%> me, O <S%H859>ye<s%> my <S%H7453>friends;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> hath <S%H5060>touched<s%> me.
Why <S%H4100><s%> do ye <S%H7291>persecute<s%> me <S%H3644>as<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> and are <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with my <S%H4480>flesh?<s%> <S%H1320><s%>
Oh <S%H4310>that<s%> my <S%H4405>words<s%> <S%H5414>were<s%> <S%H645>now<s%> <S%H3789>written!<s%> oh <S%H4310>that<s%> they <S%H5414>were<s%> <S%H2710>printed<s%> in a <S%H5612>book!<s%>
That they were <S%H2672>graven<s%> with an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H5842>pen<s%> and <S%H5777>lead<s%> in the <S%H6697>rock<s%> <S%H5703>forever!<s%>
For <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> that my <S%H1350>redeemer<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> and that he shall <S%H6965>stand<s%> at the <S%H314>latter<s%> day <S%H5921>upon<s%> the earth: <S%H6083><s%>
And though <S%H310>after<s%> my <S%H5785>skin<s%> worms <S%H5362>destroy<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> body, yet in my <S%H4480>flesh<s%> <S%H1320><s%> shall I <S%H2372>see<s%> God: <S%H433><s%>

Whom <S%H834><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> shall <S%H2372>see<s%> for myself, and mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>behold,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2114>another;<s%> though my <S%H3629>reins<s%> be <S%H3615>consumed<s%> <S%H2436>within<s%> me.
But <S%H3588><s%> ye should <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H7291>persecute<s%> we him, seeing the <S%H8328>root<s%> of the <S%H1697>matter<s%> is <S%H4672>found<s%> in me?

Be ye <S%H1481>afraid<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H2534>wrath<s%> bringeth the <S%H5771>punishments<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> ye may <S%H3045>know<s%> there is a <S%H7945>judgment.<s%> <S%H1779><s%>
